column1: Smoque BBQ////My husband introduced me to this little BBQ place a few months ago
column2: and since then I've ordered a brisket from there for Passover and dreamed about it no less than 4 times.  Look - okay
column4: right?  WRONG!  I've never had chicken like this before in my life.  Did you know that BBQ chicken can be juicy?  Flavorful?  Sexy?  Ok
column6: Smoque's chicken tempts me away from my usual brisket or ribs staples.  I haven't tried the Texas sausages yet
column7: but I'm sure I'll get around to it one of these days.
